=========================
Django Education Metadata
=========================

About
=====

Includes several types of metadata that you can enable or disable as needed.

**Education Categories**
   Hierarchical organization for education-specific categories

**Alternative Types**
   A way to specify virtual content types.

**Subjects and Disciplines**
   A Hierarchical organization of subjects and their disciplines.

**Geologic Time**
   A hierarchical organization of geologic time periods. Includes an initial set!

**Grades**
   A collection of grade levels and optionally ages. Includes an initial set of American grade levels.

**Historical Dates**
   Field and data type for handling dates with variable resolution (year, year and month, or year, month and day).
